title: to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)) of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 4) (Calculation of 
Means) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary 
Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2024 shall be construed together as one 
and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary 
Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2024. 

Commencement

title: to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)) of
heading: 3. Article 36 (amended by article 3 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
3. Article 36 (amended by article 3 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 3) (Assessment of 
Means) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 434 of 2024)) of the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 
412 of 2007) is amended– 

(a) 

by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (bb): 

“(bba) any ex gratia payments made under the Stardust Redress 
Scheme (2024),”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the foregoing Regulations. 

[604] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 October, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 October, 2024. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [604]

title: to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)) of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that any ex-gratia payments made under the Stardust 
Redress Scheme (2024) by the Department of Justice will be disregarded in the 
means test for supplementary welfare allowance payments. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [604] 5
